Uses of Class
parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv

  • Packages that use PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv 
    Package Description
    graph
    graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.
    graph.packing
    Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.
    popt4jlib.neural
    Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

    • Uses of PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv in parallel.distributed

      Subclasses of PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv in parallel.distributed 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PDBTExecInitedSrv
      class extends the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv class to allow a load-balancing distributed computing architecture, whereby a server object of this class can have many clients connected to it, but no other known servers connected to it at all.
      class  PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv
      class extends the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv class to allow a load-balancing distributed computing architecture, whereby a server object of this class can only have a single client connected to it, and no other known servers connected to it at all.

      void TaskObjectsParallelExecutionRequest.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      breaks tasks into batches, and for each batch (in parallel) finds a free worker and submits the tasks for processing, then gathers and sends all the results back to the requestor.
      void TaskObjectsExecutionResults.runProtocol(PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv srv, java.io.ObjectInputStream ois, java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
      sends back the results to the requestor (forwards).
